Which creates a Locale for US English?,Locale.US,"new Locale(""EN"", ""US"")",Locale.ENGLISH,"new Locale(""US"")"
Which method gets default Locale?,Locale.getDefault(),Locale.getSystem(),Locale.getCurrent(),Locale.get()

What happens with resource bundle fallback?
ResourceBundle bundle = ResourceBundle.getBundle("messages", new Locale("fr", "CA"));,Falls back to messages_fr.properties if messages_fr_CA.properties not found,Throws exception,Uses default locale only,Returns empty bundle
Which creates a Locale with language only?,"new Locale(""fr"")","new Locale(""fr"", """")",Locale.forLanguage(""fr""),"new Locale(""FR"")"
Which method formats a number with locale?,"NumberFormat.getInstance(locale).format(number)","NumberFormat.format(number, locale)",locale.formatNumber(number),Number.format(number)

What happens with Locale.Builder?
Locale locale = new Locale.Builder()
    .setLanguage("en")
    .setRegion("US")
    .build();
System.out.println(locale);,en_US,en,US,Compilation error
Which properties file has highest priority for Locale("fr", "CA")?,messages_fr_CA.properties,messages_fr.properties,messages.properties,messages_en.properties
Which method returns available locales?,Locale.getAvailableLocales(),Locale.getAll(),Locale.list(),Locale.getLocales()
Which class formats messages with placeholders?,MessageFormat,ResourceBundle,Formatter,String.format()
Which method gets display name of locale?,getDisplayName(),getName(),toString(),getLocaleName()

What happens with resource bundle encoding?
ResourceBundle bundle = ResourceBundle.getBundle("messages", Locale.US, new PropertyResourceBundle.Control());,Uses UTF-8 encoding (Java 9+),Uses ISO-8859-1 only,Compilation error,Encoding not configurable
Which creates a Locale for simplified Chinese in China?,"Locale.SIMPLIFIED_CHINESE or new Locale(""zh"", ""CN"")","new Locale(""cn"", ""ZH"")",Locale.CHINESE,"new Locale(""zh"")"

What happens with Locale.getISOCountries()?
String[] countries = Locale.getISOCountries();,Returns array of ISO country codes,Returns country names,Compilation error,Returns empty array

Which method parses a date string?
DateTimeFormatter formatter = DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("dd/MM/yyyy");,"LocalDate.parse(""15/01/2024"", formatter)",formatter.parse(""15/01/2024""),Both A and B,DateTimeFormatter.parse(""15/01/2024"")
